Message:
Seems like that wolf girl
resents the human side of her.

Unfortunately for her,
hating oneself is
as human as it gets...
Wait, this isn’t the time
to be thinking about this!

I’d been sentenced to imprisonment
under constant surveillance.
And the one charged with
watching me was a wolf—
the wolf girl’s mother...
Am I...about to be wolf chow...?

I mean, she’s even
licking my wounds!
And when I go to sleep,
she brings me a blanket—

“You remind me of my parents.
They’re both dead now, though.”

The wolf’s ears perked up.
Seems like she really can
understand human speech...

Feeling strangely at ease,
I found myself telling her
all kinds of things.
Like stories about my mother,
my past, my power...

“Miss Wolf? Why’re you
standing all of a sudden—

Gyahhh!
Could you not p-p-p-pull
on my sleeve like that?!”

Does she want me
to come with her?!
A-And why is she
making me run this fast?!

It’s on fire, so why is
that wolf girl here...

An explosion sends
a pillar flying,
and she’s about to be
crushed by it...!

The wolf suddenly
darted from my side,
pushing her daughter
out of harm’s way...

before getting trapped
helplessly beneath the pillar.
